resources.string: DoneRight helps you manage your daily tasks in a simple and distraction-free way. Tasks are saved locally on your device and can be synced to the cloud when you sign in, so you never lose your progress.

• Tap the ➕ button to create a new task • Tap a task card to edit its title or status • Change task status as you work on it • Swipe a task to delete it
The app is designed to be quick and easy, so you can focus on getting things done.
